revised_title: The Morphology and Development of Birds' Skeleton
tldr: The author examines the morphology and development of the bird skeleton, focusing on the vertebral column, ribs, sternum, limb-girdles, and limbs. They describe the stages of development in the common fowl, highlighting the changes in the vertebral column and the fusion of skeletal elements during growth. The author also discusses the relationship between birds and reptiles, as well as the role of metamorphosis in the evolution of vertebrates.
